hero.title: The Reservoire Koramangala: Where Every Sip is a Story
hero.subtitle: Discover Koramangala's premier rooftop cocktail bar, offering an unrivaled collection of spirits, artisanal mixes, and an unforgettable ambiance.

about.title: Welcome to The Reservoire Koramangala
about.paragraph1: Born from a passion for mixology and a love for vibrant social spaces, The Reservoire Koramangala was created to be more than just a barâ€”it's an experience. We are Koramangala's first and largest cocktail-on-tap destination, dedicated to serving up creativity, community, and unforgettable nights under the stars on our stunning rooftop.
about.paragraph2: Our name reflects our commitment to offering an expansive and ever-evolving collection of over 200 cocktails, from timeless classics to our own signature creations. Each drink is crafted with precision by our expert mixologists, using only the finest spirits and freshest ingredients. Paired with a delectable food menu designed to complement our beverages, your time at The Reservoire Koramangala is guaranteed to be a delight for all the senses.
